trans-unit.source: Provides a type converter to convert <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> objects to and from various other representations.
trans-unit.target: Gir et typen konverteringsprogram til å konvertere <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>objekter til og fra ulike representasjoner.</xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>

trans-unit.source: This converter can only convert a <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> object to and from a string.
trans-unit.target: Denne konverteringsprogram kan bare konvertere en <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>objektet til og fra en streng.</xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>

trans-unit.source: For more information about type converters, see the <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter> base class and [How to: Implement a Type Converter](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om typen konverteringsprogrammer i <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter>basisklasse og [slik: implementere et konverteringsprogram av typen](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).</xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > You should never create an instance of the CultureInfoConverter class.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Du aldri må opprette en forekomst av klassen CultureInfoConverter.

trans-unit.source: Instead, call the <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor.GetConverter%2A> method of the <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor> class.
For more information, see the examples in the <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter> base class.
trans-unit.target: For mer informasjon, kan du se eksemplene i <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter>basistabellen klasse.</xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.CultureInfoConverter"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.ComponentModel.CultureInfoConverter"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether this converter can convert an object in the given source type to a <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> using the specified context.
trans-unit.target: Henter en verdi som angir om denne konverteringsprogram kan konvertere et objekt i den angitte kildetypen til en <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>ved hjelp av den angitte konteksten.</xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>

trans-unit.source: This converter can only convert a <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> object to and from a string.
trans-unit.target: Denne konverteringsprogram kan bare konvertere en <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>objektet til og fra en streng.</xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>

trans-unit.source: The `context` parameter can be used to extract additional information about the environment this converter is being invoked from.
trans-unit.target: Den `context` parameter kan brukes til å trekke ut tilleggsinformasjon om denne konverteringsprogram aktiveres fra miljøet.

trans-unit.source: This can be `null`, so always check.
Also, properties on the context object can return `null`.
An <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"></xref> that provides a format context.
A <xref:System.Type> that represents the type you wish to convert from.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Type>som representerer typen du vil konvertere fra.</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if this converter can perform the conversion; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis denne konverteringsprogram kan utføre konverteringen; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether this converter can convert an object to the given destination type using the context.
trans-unit.target: Henter en verdi som angir om denne konverteringsprogram kan konvertere et objekt til den angitte måltypen ved hjelp av konteksten.

trans-unit.source: The `context` parameter can be used to extract additional information about the environment this converter is being invoked from.
trans-unit.target: Den `context` parameter kan brukes til å trekke ut tilleggsinformasjon om denne konverteringsprogram aktiveres fra miljøet.

trans-unit.source: This can be `null`, so always check.
Also, properties on the context object can return `null`.
An <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"></xref> that provides a format context.
A <xref:System.Type> that represents the type you wish to convert to.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Type>som representerer typen du vil konvertere til.</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if this converter can perform the conversion; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis denne konverteringsprogram kan utføre konverteringen; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Converts the specified value object to a <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>.
This converter can only convert a <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> object to and from a string.
trans-unit.target: Denne konverteringsprogram kan bare konvertere en <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>objektet til og fra en streng.</xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>

trans-unit.source: The `context` parameter can be used to extract additional information about the environment this converter is being invoked from.
trans-unit.target: Den `context` parameter kan brukes til å trekke ut tilleggsinformasjon om denne konverteringsprogram aktiveres fra miljøet.

trans-unit.source: This can be `null`, so always check.
Also, properties on the context object can return `null`.
An <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"></xref> that provides a format context.
A <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> that specifies the culture to which to convert.
The <xref:System.Object> to convert.
An <xref:System.Object> that represents the converted value.
value specifies a culture that is not valid.
The conversion cannot be performed.
Converts the given value object to the specified destination type.
trans-unit.target: Konverterer gitt verdi-objektet til den angitte måltypen.

trans-unit.source: This converter can only convert a <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> object to and from a string.
trans-unit.target: Denne konverteringsprogram kan bare konvertere en <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>objektet til og fra en streng.</xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>

trans-unit.source: The `context` parameter can be used to extract additional information about the environment this converter is being invoked from.
trans-unit.target: Den `context` parameter kan brukes til å trekke ut tilleggsinformasjon om denne konverteringsprogram aktiveres fra miljøet.

trans-unit.source: This can be `null`, so always check.
Also, properties on the context object can return `null`.
An <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"></xref> that provides a format context.
A <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> that specifies the culture to which to convert.
The <xref:System.Object> to convert.
The <xref:System.Type> to convert the value to.
An that represents the converted value.
destinationType is .
The conversion cannot be performed.
Retrieves the name of the specified culture.
trans-unit.target: Henter navnet på den angitte kulturen.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> that specifies the culture to get the name for.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>som angir kulturen som skal få setningen for. navn</xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>

trans-unit.source: The name of the specified culture.
Gets a collection of standard values for a <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> object using the specified context.
trans-unit.target: Henter en samling av standardverdier for en <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>objekt med den angitte konteksten.</xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>

trans-unit.source: The `context` parameter can be used to extract additional information about the environment this converter is being invoked from.
trans-unit.target: Den `context` parameter kan brukes til å trekke ut tilleggsinformasjon om denne konverteringsprogram aktiveres fra miljøet.

trans-unit.source: This can be `null`, so always check.
Also, properties on the context object can return `null`.
An <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"></xref> that provides a format context.

A <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.StandardValuesCollection> containing a standard set of valid values, or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if the data type does not support a standard set of values.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.StandardValuesCollection>som inneholder et standard sett med gyldige verdier, eller <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> Hvis datatypen ikke støtter et standard sett med verdier.</xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.StandardValuesCollection>

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the list of standard values returned from <xref:System.ComponentModel.CultureInfoConverter.GetStandardValues*> is an exhaustive list.
trans-unit.target: Henter en verdi som angir om listen over standard verdier skal returneres fra <xref:System.ComponentModel.CultureInfoConverter.GetStandardValues*>er en fullstendig liste.</xref:System.ComponentModel.CultureInfoConverter.GetStandardValues*>

trans-unit.source: The `context` parameter can be used to extract additional information about the environment this converter is being invoked from.
trans-unit.target: Den `context` parameter kan brukes til å trekke ut tilleggsinformasjon om denne konverteringsprogram aktiveres fra miljøet.

trans-unit.source: This can be `null`, so always check.
Also, properties on the context object can return `null`.
When the list is not exhaustive, then there are other valid values besides the list of standard values that <xref:System.ComponentModel.CultureInfoConverter.GetStandardValues%2A> provides.
trans-unit.target: Når listen ikke er fullstendig, er det andre gyldige verdier i tillegg listen over standard verdier som <xref:System.ComponentModel.CultureInfoConverter.GetStandardValues%2A>gir.</xref:System.ComponentModel.CultureInfoConverter.GetStandardValues%2A>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"></xref> that provides a format context.

<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> because the <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.StandardValuesCollection> returned from <xref:System.ComponentModel.CultureInfoConverter.GetStandardValues*> is not an exhaustive list of possible values (that is, other values are possible).
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>fordi den <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.StandardValuesCollection>returnert fra <xref:System.ComponentModel.CultureInfoConverter.GetStandardValues*>er ikke en fullstendig liste over mulige verdier (det vil si andre verdier er mulig).</xref:System.ComponentModel.CultureInfoConverter.GetStandardValues*> </xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.StandardValuesCollection>

trans-unit.source: This method never returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden returnerer aldri <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether this object supports a standard set of values that can be picked from a list using the specified context.
trans-unit.target: Henter en verdi som angir om dette objektet støtter et standard sett med verdier som kan velges fra en liste med den angitte konteksten.

trans-unit.source: The `context` parameter can be used to extract additional information about the environment this converter is being invoked from.
trans-unit.target: Den `context` parameter kan brukes til å trekke ut tilleggsinformasjon om denne konverteringsprogram aktiveres fra miljøet.

trans-unit.source: This can be `null`, so always check.
Also, properties on the context object can return `null`.
An <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"></xref> that provides a format context.

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> because <xref:System.ComponentModel.CultureInfoConverter.GetStandardValues*> should be called to find a common set of values the object supports.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>fordi <xref:System.ComponentModel.CultureInfoConverter.GetStandardValues*>må kalles for å finne et vanlig sett med verdier objektet støtter.</xref:System.ComponentModel.CultureInfoConverter.GetStandardValues*>

trans-unit.source: This method never returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden returnerer aldri <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.
